author: Guangxi Minority Languages Orthography Committee. 2008.
notes: Guangxi Minority Languages Orthography Committee. 2008. Vocabularies of Guangxi ethnic languages [广西民族语言方音词汇]. Beijing: Nationalities Publishing House [民族出版社].There are about 9,000 speakers of Wusehua 五色话 in and around Rongshui County, Guangxi. Their autonym is e3 hwen1.The selected variant is that of Xiatan village下覃村, Yongle township 永乐乡, Guangxi. The informants are Meng Wenji 蒙文辑, 55, Tan Fuji 覃福洁, 44, and Tan Fujian 覃福键, 44.Tones:1 = /42/2 = /231/3 = /44/4 = /35/5 = /24/6 = /55/7 (long) = /24/7 (short) = /22/
